settings.heading: Formulated for healthy and problem-free skin
settings.text: Our products are scientifically developed and carefully formulated to improve the health and appearance of your unique skin. We understand the importance of formulating the best combination of innovative skincare ingredients to provide you with safe, highly effective products that deliver on their promises. All of our products are free of potential irritants like synthetic dyes and fragrances. FCL does not perform or condone animal testing

settings.heading: Scientifically formulated products for healthy skin
settings.text: Formulating products that improve the health of your skin is a cornerstone of Fixderma Cosmetic Laboratories. When choosing ingredients and developing products, we always maintain a deep respect for human health, animals, and the environment. This is why all FCL products are free of synthetic dyes, fragrances, mineral oil, petrolatum, lanolin, and phthalates. FCL pairs health, nature, and science to create each of our products, which offers you an effective solution for the health of your skin.

settings.heading: Skincare backed by science
settings.text: We constantly research and work with scientists and dermatologists to unlock the therapeutic power of nature’s most restorative ingredients, giving you clinically proven products that nurture and care for your skin. All FCL products are made with natural cosmetic ingredients, known to exhibit anti-aging, anti-itch, antioxidant, and protective properties, making them a versatile product for all skin types and age groups.

settings.heading: We care for men
settings.text: FCL offers customized formulations for men's skincare that are potent enough to penetrate through the hard male skin and give the desired results. The formulations are enriched with active anti-pollutants which counter the environmental ill effects on men’s skin.

settings.heading: What sets FCL Skincare apart?
settings.row_content: At FCL, science is at the heart of everything we create. Our formulations are crafted through extensive research and rigorous clinical trials, led by expert dermatologists. We don’t just target symptoms — we address underlying causes of skin concerns with potent, proven ingredients. Each product is designed to deliver real results, with safety and efficacy as top priorities.

settings.heading: Are FCL Skincare products tested on animals?
settings.row_content: Absolutely not. FCL Skincare is a certified cruelty-free brand — we never test on animals and remain firmly committed to ethical, humane practices in every step of our product development.

settings.heading: Are FCL Skincare products free from harmful chemicals and parabens?
settings.row_content: Yes. FCL Skincare products are free from parabens, sulfates, phthalates, mineral oil, and artificial fragrances. Each formula is scientifically developed using safe, effective ingredients to support healthy skin—without the toxins your skin doesn’t need.

settings.heading: Are FCL Skincare products suitable for men?
settings.row_content: Absolutely. FCL Skincare is designed for all skin types—regardless of gender. We understand the unique needs of men’s skin and offer dermatologist-approved formulations that effectively address skin concerns. Whether it’s acne, dullness, or dryness, we’ve got targeted solutions for both men and women.

settings.heading: Can pregnant women use FCL Skincare products for their skincare needs?
settings.row_content: Yes. FCL Skincare offers gentle, over-the-counter products that are safe for use during pregnancy. Our formulations are carefully developed to support the unique skincare needs of expecting mothers, without compromising on safety or efficacy. However, we always recommend consulting your doctor or dermatologist before starting any new skincare routine during pregnancy.

settings.heading: Do FCL Skincare products require a doctor’s prescription?
settings.row_content: Most FCL Skincare products are over-the-counter and safe for regular use. However, for our Rx (prescription) range or if you have a specific skin concern, it’s best to consult a dermatologist to ensure the right and safe usage. All our products are dermatologist-approved and formulated with your skin’s long-term health in mind.
